sentences.cn: 标准尺寸的斯诺克球台

sentences.en: Can have the same influence and his snooker Ding Junhui.
sentences.cn: 能够达到相同影响力的还有丁俊晖和他的斯诺克.

sentences.en: Free use of snooker for 1 hour weekly ( Advanced reservation required ).
sentences.cn: 每周使用5楼康乐中心桌球1小时 ( 需提前预订 ).

sentences.en: Have you played snooker with Tim yet? He's a push - over.
sentences.cn: 你和蒂姆玩落袋撞球游戏 吗 ?他的水平极差,很容易击败.

sentences.en: Historically, snooker balls were made exclusively from heavy ivory.
sentences.cn: 历史上, 斯诺克用球只能用沉重的象牙来制造.

sentences.en: I find snooker riveting though I don't play myself.
sentences.cn: 虽然我自己不打斯诺克，但是我觉得它挺令人着迷。

sentences.en: Snooker and table tennis courtside behaviour includes a ban on flash photography.
sentences.cn: 在台球和乒乓球比赛的周边场地规定禁止使用闪光灯拍照.

sentences.en: The billiards star of the snooker has become widely known personages soon.
sentences.cn: 斯诺克台球明星很快就成为了家喻户晓的人物.

sentences.en: Thereupon, a generation of new professional players of snooker have emerged too.
sentences.cn: 随之, 也诞生了一代新的斯诺克职业手.

sentences.en: They meet up every Friday to play snooker .
sentences.cn: 他们每周五碰头打斯诺克台球。

sentences.en: They're birds of a feather - they both like football, snooker and drinking beer.
sentences.cn: 他们有共同的志趣 —— 两人都喜爱踢足球, 打落袋(撞球戏)和喝啤酒.

sentences.en: This issue of Sport explores the world of Snooker.
sentences.cn: 而本期的《运动网》就将在斯诺克台球的天地中畅游一番.

sentences.en: Well, football, baseball, snooker and ice - skating are my favorites.
sentences.cn: 喔, 足球 、 棒球 、 台球和滑冰是我最喜欢的运动.

sentences.en: Williams has confirmed his position as the world's number one snooker player.
sentences.cn: 威廉姆斯巩固了自己世界头号斯诺克选手的地位。

trans.tran_en: a game played especially in Britain on a special table covered in green cloth, in which two people use long sticks to hit coloured balls into holes at the sides and corners of the table
